Posted By: divine_exodus (3/29/2011 7:56:37 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: The new artwork is absolutely gorgeous, but the mana cost is too expensive. I'm okay with the WWW in its mana cost, because it's an angel card that gives you white flying Spirit creature tokens. Three White makes perfect sense to me. But it should cost 2 less colorless mana. After all, you won't even start getting the tokens until the beginning of your next turn. Until then, you have just paid 7 CMC for a 4/4 flyer. I can think of a lot more powerful cards (or even two separate cards, for that matter) that could help you out a whole lot more. To make this card worth it, you have to make sure that it lasts at least two or three turns. That late in the game, you have to assume that your opponent is going to have things that will squash a 4/4.
posts.html:

Three White makes perfect sense to me. But it should cost 2 less colorless mana. After all, you won't even start getting the tokens until the beginning of your next turn. Until then, you have just paid 7 CMC for a 4/4 flyer. I can think of a lot more powerful cards (or even two separate cards, for that matter) that could help you out a whole lot more. To make this card worth it, you have to make sure that it lasts at least two or three turns. That late in the game, you have to assume that your opponent is going to have things that will squash a 4/4.

Posted By: SleetFox (9/10/2010 11:21:15 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Amazing artwork and a strong casual card.
  
   
I think people are a bit down on expensive angels/white biggies like this because of power creep, which has recently gotten pretty crazy with creatures.
  
   
But she's still a very good card, particularly in her day, for most players (ie not tourny playing constructed players).
posts.html:
